project.name: Taylors Project
project.description: Project management and task tracking system

instructions.task_creation: Create tasks in JSON format with all required fields. Use ISO8601 timestamps (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ).
instructions.task_update: When updating tasks, don't modify the task directly instead add an update to the task, all updates should follow update_template.json
instructions.update_process: Each update should include date, description, creator, and optionally new_owner when responsibility transfers.
instructions.id_format: Use auto-generated IDs with prefix 'task-' followed by 3-digit number.
